content.rendered:
Posterhead Signs

Posterhead Signs is located in Las Vegas, Nevada. We can make a variety of signs including real estate signs, yard signs, business signs, sidewalk signs, posters, removable wall graphics, and many other types of signs.

Posterhead also does vinyl lettering, window lettering,business door lettering, car window lettering, and other types of vinyl lettering.

With a name like Posterhead, we also make posters and removable wall graphics. Posters are made in a variety of sizes such as 16 x 20, 20 x 30, 24 x 36 as well as life size posters. Posterhead also makes removable wall graphics from phototex material, which allows for a graphic to be applied to a wall and removed without any paint damage to the wall. Popular removable wall graphics include children in sports poses, lingerie wall graphics, and life-size wall graphics of places and events. Posterhead makes a product that is similar to Fathead (Fathead is a trademarked name and Posterhead is not associated in any way to Fathead). Posterhead is merely making a product comparison and recognizes Fathead as a quality product.

As a member benefit partner to the Greater Las Vegas Association of Realtors, GLVAR, Posterhead makes real estate signs for GLVAR members. Along with real estate signs, Posterhead also can make agents banners, sidewalk signs, and other real estate signs. We offer GLVAR Members a discount!

If vinyl lettering is needed for your outdoor business signs, sidewalk signs, A frame signs, window lettering, or business door lettering, we can assist you with all those needs. Posterhead has many different colors of vinyl in stock to make your sidewalk signs,business windows, business doors, and window lettering look fantastic and promote your business. Vinyl lettering is a low cost solution to increasing product awareness.

 

 

Sample pricing
contact us for a quote

4ft x 4ft signs  $99
4ft x 8 ft signs $150Real Estate Signs $28.00
18 x 24 on aluminum w/ rounded corners
artwork supplied by customerDoor/Window Business Hours $50 installed		 Car Magnets 12 x 18  $30 set
Car Magnets 12 x 24 $40 set
other size magnets availableSidewalk Sign  $120
includes 2 inserts & Plasticade deluxe frame

If you need a size not listed, just ask!
Contact us for additional specials

We belong to the
GLVAR member benefit program.
